 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָמִיר‎</span> **noun [masculine]** ==swath, row of fallen grain== (***hay***, as Mishna, according to [[BDB#Vogelst|Vogelst]]<sup>l.c. 74 f.</sup> (who is then compelled to read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֹמֶר‎</span> [[Mic.4.12|Mic 4:12]]), compare Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***grass***, [[BDB#Schw|Schw]]<sup>Idioticon 69</sup>); — [[Amos.2.13|Amos 2:13]] (on cart), [[Jer.9.21|Jer 9:21]] (falling behind reaper), [[Mic.4.12|Mic 4:12]] (brought to threshing-floor), [[Zech.12.6|Zech 12:6]] (inflammable).
